Data: 1.10pm Important toss for Australia to win that. A bit of dew later, some inclement weather around. How much do WI need? Out come the players. They line up on either side of the pitch for a minute of silence for Tony Cozier.
Starc to Charles, no run full and straight to start. 141 kph. Some swing, just enough swing. Yorker first up, outside off. Charles jams it out
Starc to Charles, 1 run more swing. Angled away from the right-hander and quite wide outside off, flayed to third man. Bat away from body

Starc to Fletcher, no run whew. Massive appeal. That looked out. A full swinging yorker. And Smith reviews. he has to. That looked plumb. Big inside edge on that on closer inspection.But wow, what a start fro Starc. back to his swinging best right away. Som

Starc to Fletcher, (no ball) FOUR runs oh my. What an over so far already. A very high full toss outside off. No ball called. Fletcher goes after it and gets a thick outside edge towards first slip. Smith hurries out of the way
Starc to Fletcher, no run full on middle, inswing. Slogged to mid-on. Couldn't quite get under the free hit to get that away

Starc to Fletcher, OUT gone. Whoa. Some start this. Full and wide outside off, not a lot of swing but enough. Fletcher wafts at it aimlessly and the skew flies to backward point. Comfortable height and comfortably taken. Starc has a wicket in his first over
Starc to Bravo, no run nice and straight, 147 kph. Bravo presents the full face of the bat to block
Hazlewood to Charles, no run fullish and wide to start. A good start. Some away shape. Left alone
Hazlewood to Charles, no run 135 kph. Nice. Full and wide again, inviting the drive. Charles accepts the invitation, but cannot connect
Hazlewood to Charles, no run fullish on off, blocked. Not much swing there
Hazlewood to Charles, no run nice lengths these. Nagging away outside Charles' off stump. Defended
Hazlewood to Charles, no run shortish this time, a sixth-stump line. Swatted to mid-on
Hazlewood to Charles, 1 run full and straight, a thick inside edge to fine leg gets Charles one
Starc to Charles, 2 runs nicely played. Full on off, not a lot of movement. Driven into the off side, through the covers, for a couple
Starc to Charles, 1 run edged and flies away to third man. 141 kph. Intentionally bowling it quite full to extract as much swing from the air as possible
Starc to Bravo, no run leg side-ish, a fantastic save from Wade. Clipped the pads and looked like it was four leg byes but Wade got across
Starc to Bravo, no run driven into the cover region. Quite tentative outside the off stump
Starc to Bravo, 1 wide strays in line again. Drifts down leg for an extra
Starc to Bravo, no run shortish and wide, left alone
Starc to Bravo, 1 run full and straight, very full. Jammed to fine leg off the inside edge
Hazlewood to Bravo, no run nice lines. Fullish and wide outside off, Bravo leaves alone
Hazlewood to Bravo, no run nice again. Full and wide, some late outswing. Bravo leaves happily
Hazlewood to Bravo, 1 run a tad straighter and flicked to fine leg to get one
Hazlewood to Charles, no run a good length on middle. Charles tries to flick but misses and is struck on the midriff. A bit late on the nudge
Hazlewood to Charles, no run fullish on a fourth-stump line. Blocked. Dead bat

Hazlewood to Charles, FOUR runs edged and dropped. Not easy at all. Fullish and wide again, Charles gives it his all with a flashy drive. A thick outside edge flies over Smith at first slip who leaps but can only parry it to the boundary. Good effort
Starc to Bravo, FOUR runs uh oh. 147.4 kph. A naughty full toss outside off, Bravo leans on the drive and gets it through the point area. Scurries across the slow outfield. Swung in the air though
Starc to Bravo, 1 wide and now down the leg side. Wide
Starc to Bravo, no run nicely bowled. Gets his line right. Full and wide outside off, just enough away movement to take the ball past the outside edge
Starc to Bravo, 1 wide too wide again. This time way outside off stump. Another wide called
Starc to Bravo, no run a good length on middle and leg, 145 kph. Tucked to square leg
Starc to Bravo, FOUR runs superbly played. Full and wide, too full, overpitched. Bravo lays into the drive and crisply times it to the cover boundary
Starc to Bravo, no run another full toss on middle and leg, pushed to mid-on. Maybe time to give him a break
Starc to Bravo, no run fullish length outside off and Bravo shoulders arms
Hazlewood to Charles, no run full again. Charles lunges forward to defend
Hazlewood to Charles, 1 run a good length on middle is swivel-flicked to fine leg
Hazlewood to Bravo, (no ball) no-ball. Hazlewood oversteps. Full on middle, driven to mid-on.
Hazlewood to Bravo, FOUR runs smashed. Clobbered away. Hazlewod digs it in on middle, Bravo backs away and hammers the pull to the square leg boundary. Shot!
Hazlewood to Bravo, no run shortish and wide, Bravo goes back and tries to punch a drive but the slowness of the pitch means he miscues to cover
Hazlewood to Bravo, 1 run a good run. Good length on middle, inside-edged to square leg for a quick single. Well done
Hazlewood to Charles, no run defended from the crease
Lyon to Bravo, no run nicely tossed up on middle, fluently driven to cover. Too full there
Lyon to Bravo, 1 run better. Shortens the length outside off and extracts plenty of turn. Slapped to deep cover

Lyon to Charles, no run massive appeal. Whew, that was close. Flat on middle and off, the ball skids on with the arm and Charles misses a flick. That looked out. The umpire Gregory Brathwaite says no. Did that pitch in line? I thought so. Carried on with th
Lyon to Charles, no run worked to fine leg
Lyon to Charles, no run a massive slog attempted but the ball spins and hits the pad down the leg side
Lyon to Charles, 1 wide slides down leg for an extra
Lyon to Charles, 1 run starts it off wider outside off, tucked to fine leg from off and middle stump
Marsh to Charles, no run overpitched on off, driven to mid-on
Marsh to Charles, no run full and wide, mis-timed to mid-on
Marsh to Charles, 1 run quite full on off and driven to mid-off for a run. To Warner. Good single

Marsh to Bravo, 1 run just wide of a diving cover. More evidence of the slowness of the pitch. Full and wide, Bravo is through the drive too early, the ball lobs up and just evades a diving Smith at cover
Marsh to Charles, no run tapped into the cover region
Marsh to Charles, no run pulled to square leg, dragged the stroke from outside off
Lyon to Bravo, 1 run a tad too short outside off, Bravo rocks back and smashed the cross-batted slap to deep cover
Lyon to Charles, no run another close shout. Full outside off, brings Charles forward who gets a thin edge on his half-willed prod
Lyon to Charles, SIX runs uses his feet, runs to the pitch of the ball and slogs it over midwicket. The execution aided by the steps to the pitch of the ball
Lyon to Charles, 1 run flat on middle, a thick inside edge onto his pad. Otherwide that was out
Lyon to Bravo, no run nicely bowled. Tossed up outside off, left alone
Lyon to Bravo, 1 run too short again, thrashed to deep cover off the back foot
Marsh to Bravo, no run full and wide, left alone
Marsh to Bravo, no run shortens the length and brings it closer to off stump. Bravo goes back and eases into a defensive stroke into the off side
Marsh to Bravo, no run fullish length outside off, another leave
Marsh to Bravo, no run short and wide, there for the cut, Bravo goes after it but fails to connect
Marsh to Bravo, no run shot! Overpitched outside off, fluently driven to mid-off
Marsh to Bravo, no run maiden. Nice over. Full and wide again, Bravo doesn't interfere
Lyon to Charles, no run tossed up outside off, Charles strides forward and defends
Lyon to Charles, no run another big swing but the spin takes the ball away from the bat. Thuds into his body
Lyon to Charles, no run another edge. Looking very tentative here. Flatter outside off, a thin edge from Charles into his pad
Lyon to Charles, no run clever bowling. Slower on middle but short enough. Charles misses a flick, the ball hits his pad down leg
Lyon to Charles, 2 runs another edgy stroke. Flat down leg, tickled fine, more off the inside half. To fine leg for a couple
Lyon to Charles, no run good over that. Run-scoring getting increasingly harder. Turned to backward square leg

Marsh to Bravo, OUT poor shot. Full and wide, Bravo lays into a drive but fails to keep it down. Hits an uppish drive but straight to extra cover who juggles it and then takes it inches away from the ground. Not sure what he was trying to do there, maybe t
Marsh to Samuels, no run overpitched outside off, solidly blocked
Marsh to Samuels, no run good field-placing. Shortish delivery outside off is guided towards third man but a gully stops the single. keeps Samuels on 0
Marsh to Samuels, no run another overpitched delivery is just jammed into the off side
Marsh to Samuels, no run superb change-up. Goes short and surprises Samuels who sways out of the line quite late. Nice direction on that
Marsh to Samuels, 3 runs strays down leg, allowing Samuels to tickle it towards fine leg for three. Well played, good diving stop too
Lyon to Samuels, 2 wide down leg again, Wade cannot collect cleanly, allows the extra run
Lyon to Charles, no run another big appeal, but that didn't look out. Too much turn. Quite flat outside off, the ball rips back in toward Charles who misses it again. Sliding down
Lyon to Charles, no run comes down the track and thrashes a drive to mid-off
Lyon to Charles, 1 run intriguing battle this. Lyon sees Charles coming and shortens the length. Charles comes down and slogs it on the bounce to deep midwicket
Lyon to Samuels, 1 run worked to fine leg
Lyon to Charles, no run this one drifts away from the bat, beaten on the outside edge outside off stump. Nice bowling

Lyon to Charles, 1 leg bye lovely bowling. Very full on middle and off, Charles misses it yet again. Quite bewildering that there wasn't much of an appeal. There was something from Lyon. Leg byes, maybe too much turn again but that looked close
Starc to Charles, 1 wide straight away down leg for a wide

Starc to Charles, OUT bowled im. That's why he was brought back. Charles' struggling innings ends. A superb yorker again, not for the first time Charles gets an inside edge but this time it rattled into middle stump. Late swing back in. Superb stuff from S
Starc to Ramdin, no run a low full toss on leg. Looking for the yorker again, bunted to mid-on
Starc to Ramdin, no run nice bowling. Attacking the base of those stumps, pushed to mid-on.
Starc to Ramdin, 1 run not quite the bouncer but short outside off, upper cut to third man for a run
Starc to Samuels, 2 runs looking for the yorker again but misses. A low full toss is sliced away past point. A superb acrobatic effort from Lyon at sweeper cover saves two runs
Starc to Samuels, no run full and straight, blocked
Lyon to Ramdin, no run flat on middle, Ramdin hangs back to defend
Lyon to Ramdin, no run straight to short leg, those ones only stick. Flat down leg, worked to Finch's ankle at short leg. Got up too early. Why is Finch there?
Lyon to Ramdin, no run worked away to fine leg
Lyon to Ramdin, no run flat on off, not much turn. Pushed to midwicket
Lyon to Ramdin, 1 run slower and straighter, easily whipped to deep square leg
Lyon to Samuels, 2 runs strays down leg again, nudged with soft hands towards fine leg for a couple
Starc to Ramdin, 2 wide drifts down leg for yet another extra. Wade mis-collects as well
Starc to Samuels, no run full and straight, Samuels is hurries for pace but manages a defensive pat back
Starc to Samuels, no run 146 kph, full on off. Blocked
Starc to Samuels, 1 run a loose stroke. Full and wide, Samuels drives away from his body. Lobs it up to sweeper cover
Starc to Ramdin, no run nice and full again, attacking the stumps. Ramdin's bat intervenes
Starc to Ramdin, 1 leg bye down leg again, pings off the pads towards fine leg for a run
Starc to Samuels, 1 run driven to mid-on for a quick run. Samuels made his ground, but was he lazy in getting his bat down? The third umpire is called. He was but he just about made it.

Lyon to Samuels, OUT given this time by umpire Brathwaite. Flat on middle and leg, skids on with the arm. The ball thuds into Samuels' pads in front of leg. This time the finger goes up. Samuels went deep in his crease but just missed his flick. Umpire's c

Lyon to Pollard, OUT straight to long-on. Pollard falls. Australia have two in two. Lyon has two in two. The same shot that got WI out of trouble in the previous game causes further misery for WI here. Tossed up on middle, some spin takes the inside half o
Lyon to Brathwaite, no run some flight on off, Brathwaite comes forward to defend
Lyon to Brathwaite, no run shorter and wider outside off, Brathwaite defends off the back foot
Lyon to Brathwaite, no run superb bowling. More flight on middle, pushed into the off side
Lyon to Brathwaite, no run flatter, shorter, quicker. Brathwaite defends
Zampa to Ramdin, 1 run starts with a flatter delivery outside off, slapped to cover
Zampa to Brathwaite, 1 run slower and shorter and wider, punched off the back foot to sweeper cover
Zampa to Ramdin, no run ripping turn. Slows it up outside off at 87 kph, beats the bat by a few miles
Zampa to Ramdin, no run flight on off, draws Ramdin forward who outside-halves to third man. Lovely bowling
Zampa to Ramdin, no run this time quicker through the air outside off, pushed to cover hurriedly
Zampa to Ramdin, no run short and wide, mis-times a slap back to the bowler
Lyon to Brathwaite, no run dangled across off, Ricky aims a sweep across the line and misses
Lyon to Brathwaite, no run slides through outside off, jabbed to the cover region
Lyon to Brathwaite, no run drifting into the leg stump, this is loopier, Ricky goes low and squirts it onto the pad via an inside edge
Lyon to Brathwaite, 1 run fuller and quicker, Ricky skips back and glances to short fine leg
Lyon to Ramdin, no run no turn, skids on, flat on off, defended from the crease
Lyon to Ramdin, 2 runs offbreak on the pads, helped away finer of short fine leg. Finch lumbers after the ball and keeps it to two
Zampa to Brathwaite, 1 run dropped fraction short and outside off, flat-bat slap to long-on. Ramdin swerves and ducks out of the way
Zampa to Ramdin, 2 runs Ramdin bends and meets a low full toss. Neatly paddled down to fine leg
Zampa to Ramdin, no run quick fizzer, jabbed to cover
Zampa to Ramdin, no run lovely legbreak, pitches on off and turns sharply past the outside edge. Ramdin stabs and misses
Zampa to Ramdin, 1 run straighter one, swept behind square for one
Zampa to Brathwaite, no run an appeal for lbw! Umpire Llong shakes his head and shoots down the appeal. Skids on and hits the pad, pitched in line, probably heading down leg
Maxwell to Ramdin, no run breaks into the pads, knocked gently to midwicket
Maxwell to Ramdin, 1 run similar ball, worked to the right of the square-leg umpire
Maxwell to Brathwaite, no run fired at 96ks, kept out
Maxwell to Brathwaite, 1 run Ricky goes back and dabs a single to point
Maxwell to Ramdin, 1 run full and straight, picked away behind square on the leg side
Maxwell to Brathwaite, no run helped off the pads behind square again
Zampa to Ramdin, 1 run lobs a full toss on middle, whipped to deep midwicket
Zampa to Brathwaite, no run quicker legbreak, Ricky hangs back, prods and is beaten by turn
Zampa to Brathwaite, 1 run looks like a googly, swerved in, Ricky sits back and targets the leg side with a flick. He does not pick it and ends up popping it over Zampa's head via a leading edge
Zampa to Ramdin, no run shorter and outside off, slapped to extra cover on the back foot
Zampa to Ramdin, no run tossed on middle, defensively bunted to mid-on
Zampa to Ramdin, 1 run slides on and turns outside off, chopped to deep point
Maxwell to Ramdin, no run length ball on off, blocked back to Maxi

Maxwell to Ramdin, OUT an appeal for lbw, Maxi gets it to straighten, given! Pushed on middle, Ramdin presses forward and plays across the line and is trapped in front. Rapped on the front pad. No inside snick involved. Ump Brathwaite's call is vindicated.
Maxwell to Holder, no run
Maxwell to Holder, no run angled on off, played back to Maxi
Maxwell to Holder, 1 leg bye leg-stump ball, diverted to the right of short leg
Maxwell to Brathwaite, no run straighter one, Holder dead-bats it
Zampa to Holder, no run lobs it full on middle, jammed back to Zampa. Toe-ended back
Zampa to Holder, 1 run slides on outside off, tapped to the off-side sweeper
Zampa to Brathwaite, 1 run quicker legbreak, this time Ricky taps it to sweeper cover
Zampa to Holder, OUT bowled 'em! Holder rocks away outside leg and exposes all three stumps. Zampa takes aim and locks his target. He fires a slider and takes the off stump. The hosts are seven down
Zampa to Benn, no run floated on middle and leg, poked back to Zampa off the inside edge
Zampa to Benn, 2 runs darted on the pads, Benn goes low and controls a sweep behind square
Lyon to Brathwaite, no run breaks in on te leg stump dabbed to square leg off the back foot
Lyon to Brathwaite, no run tickled from outside off to short third man
Lyon to Brathwaite, no run slides across off, bunted in front of point on the front foot
Lyon to Brathwaite, no run goes with the angle outside off from round the wicket, pushed to cover
Lyon to Brathwaite, no run an appeal for lbw, not given. Lyon gets it to straighten, but hits the batsman outside the line of off
Lyon to Brathwaite, no run turn and dip, prodded to square leg
Starc to Benn, no run full toss on off, Benn is surprised, squeezed out towards mid-on. Lobbed below waist line, Benn is a tall man
Starc to Benn, no run too full on off, driven to mid-on
Starc to Benn, no run full and no swing outside off, 150.6kph/93.6mph swished to mid-off now
Starc to Benn, 1 run yorker just a shade outside off, squirted to cover
Starc to Brathwaite, no run full and swings away outside off, leaving Ricky prodding and missing from the crease
Starc to Brathwaite, no run pitched up and angling away outside off, Ricky shoulders arms
Lyon to Benn, OUT Soft, soft dismissal. Khawaja pats Lyon on the head. Looped up on middle, may have stopped a touch on Benn. He has to check his push-drive, he ends up plopping it back to Lyon
Lyon to Narine, no run full and turns away from Narine, beats the outside edge
Lyon to Narine, no run drifts in on middle, defended to short extra cover
Lyon to Narine, FOUR runs full on middle, Narine gets forward and drives it in the gap at the covers. First boundary for WI since the 9th over
Lyon to Narine, no run flighted nicely on middle, Narine inches forward and smothers it
Lyon to Narine, no run full and turns away, open-faced dab to short third man
Starc to Brathwaite, no run full and outside off, run away to point
Starc to Brathwaite, no run full and swings in on middle at 145ks, dug out
Starc to Brathwaite, no run full and outside off, 140.4ks, ignored
Starc to Brathwaite, no run full toss, swings in on off, 148ks poked out to cover
Starc to Brathwaite, 1 run full and angling in outside off, guided to third man
Starc to Narine, no run hurled outside off, left alone
Lyon to Brathwaite, FOUR runs One-bounce four. Ricky tees off. Slides on off, Ricky did not get under it. He looked to loft and ends up slicing it to the long-off boundary
Lyon to Brathwaite, no run pushed on off, he presses forward and squirts it through square leg via an inside edge
Lyon to Brathwaite, no run flighted on the pads, bunted back to Lyon
Lyon to Brathwaite, SIX runs He nailed that! Lyon slows this up on middle, the batsman likes the flight. He gets under this full ball and smokes it over midwicket. Clean swing, that
Lyon to Brathwaite, no run Lyon replies with an off-stump dart, defended
Lyon to Brathwaite, 1 run flicked off the back foot through backward square leg. Lyon finishes with 3 for 39
Starc to Brathwaite, no run yorker, homing in on off from round the stumps, 147ks, squirted out
Starc to Brathwaite, no run Starc ventures wide of the crease and zips in a yorker on middle, jammed back to Starc
Starc to Brathwaite, 2 runs angling into the hips, eased to long leg for a brace
Starc to Brathwaite, no run wide of the crease 148ks yorker, dug out. Ricky can't do much
Starc to Brathwaite, no run he aims for another yorker, bowls a half-volley outside off instead, carved to cover
Starc to Brathwaite, no run full toss just outside off, slapped only to short extra cover
Zampa to Narine, 1 run flighted outside off, milked down to long-on
Zampa to Brathwaite, no run tossed on middle, driven to short extra cover
Zampa to Brathwaite, 1 run legbreak, dabbed towards short third man for one

Zampa to Narine, OUT wrong'un and Zampa strikes again! Narine showed his ace early by dancing out. Zampa dangles a googly outside off, got it to dip as well. Narine aimed a hack across the line and did not touch it. Wade flips the bails off
Zampa to Taylor, no run fired full and dips at the leg stump, dug out hurriedly
Zampa to Taylor, 1 run 75ks, change-up in pace, much slower and fuller, driven to long-off
Starc to Taylor, no run off-stump yorker, tails in, squeezed to short extra cover
Starc to Taylor, no run mighty full and homes in on middle, jabbed to cover. 148ks, that
Starc to Taylor, no run full and darts back in at 142ks, beats the flick and pings off the pad towards the leg side
Starc to Taylor, no run full and outside off, slashes and.... there was a noise - it came from the bat jamming the ground. No nick as the ball lodges in the gloves of Wade
Starc to Taylor, no run short and angled in, kicks up rudely at the batsman, fends it towards point after loosening the grip
Starc to Taylor, FOUR runs yorker, tails in, blocked down the ground, to the left of mid-on for four
Zampa to Brathwaite, no run lobbed up, may have been a googly, Ricky prods and gets an inside edge onto the pad
Zampa to Brathwaite, no run slider outside off, chopped to short third man
Zampa to Brathwaite, OUT floated on off, 79ks Ricky has a big swing at it. He does not get under it. He has to settle with a sliced hit. Finch pouches it at the edge of the long-on boundary

3.45pm Starc and spinners rout WI for 116 in 32.3. Lyon and Zampa lead the side off the field. Starc removed Fletcher in the first over on his comeback and hit speeds north of 145ks consistently, despite spraying the ball around a bit. Zampa and Lyon took over in

3.55pm Thanks Deiva. We are back for the chase. Will be a short 35-minute period before the dinner break. WI have no other option but going to Sunil Narine, here he is. Warner's on strike, his opening partner is Aaron Finch.
Narine to Warner, no run a flat delivery on middle to start, Warner comes forward and blocks solidly
Narine to Warner, FOUR runs shortish delivery on off, a rank long-hop is pulled with disdain to the midwicket boundary. Easy pickings
Narine to Warner, 1 run slower offbreak outside off, Warner misjudged the length but went back to drive to long-off
Narine to Finch, no run flat on middle and leg, clipped to midwicket where Pollard makes a diving stop
Narine to Finch, no run ooh, the offbreak. Finch backed away and exposed his stumps. Hit it back

Narine to Finch, no run Ramdin thinks he has Finch. Maybe not. Slower outside off, Finch tries to go over cover but fails to connect. Finch's back foot was out but he dragged it back just in time. Just a smidgen behind. Nice keeping from Ramdin
Taylor to Warner, 1 run nice running. A good length delivery, coming back in. There is no boundary to be hit, so Warner pushes to cover and sets off for one. Superb
Taylor to Finch, no run good length outside off, some away swing. Loosely pushed to cover
Taylor to Finch, 1 run nice lines. Fullish on off and middle, squeezed to midwicket. Even with a direct it at the batsman's end, Warner is comfortably in. A good run again
Taylor to Warner, no run quite full outside off, driven into the cover region
Taylor to Warner, no run too straight this time and easily flicked away towards midwicket who puts in a good diving stop
Taylor to Warner, FOUR runs scythed through point. Not excellently timed but enough for Warner to get four. Too full, Warner drives from the crease and threads the gap at point. Nice stroke.
Narine to Finch, no run flat and straight, a turning offbreak is pushed back to Finch
Narine to Finch, no run flatter trajectory on middle, whipped to midwicket
Narine to Finch, no run more turn on off and middle, Finch is persistent on that back foot, backing away. Pushes to mid-off, a bit of miscommunication with Warner
Narine to Finch, no run Narine pushes it fuller and Finch comes forward, a thick inside edge to fine leg
Narine to Finch, no run nice bowling. Much fuller on off, prodded away by Finch. Aus need not do more against Narine
Narine to Finch, no run 83 kph on off, Narine bowls a maiden. Finch backs away, trying to cut through point but mis-times to cover
Taylor to Warner, 1 run shortish on off, Warner stays tall and steers a cut to third man. Played that nicely
Taylor to Finch, no run a yorker on leg stump, flicked to midwicket
Taylor to Finch, FOUR runs too straight and smashed. Phew, what timing on that. Just a flick and it whistled past square leg. First shot of such timing all day

Taylor to Finch, FOUR runs and again. Poor bowling. Rather full, straight. Easy pickings for Finch as he whips another one through midwicket. To the other side of the square leg fielder. Runs flowing for Aus.
Taylor to Finch, 2 runs drifts down leg and flicked to fine leg. Exceptional running and two is easily made
Taylor to Finch, no run full and straight, clipped to midwicket
Narine to Warner, 2 runs flat on middle and leg, nurdled in the gap at backward square leg for a couple. Good placement
Narine to Warner, no run some flight on middle, blocked
Narine to Warner, no run shorter, still gets plenty of turn on that outside off. Warner pats it back
Narine to Warner, FOUR runs shot! Short! Too much width and Warner carves one through backward point for four. Fantastic placement. Warner is in some form
Narine to Warner, 1 run overpitched on leg, Warner doesn't need to do much to smother the spin and clip to square leg for a run
Narine to Finch, FOUR runs swept away for four. Tossed up on off, Finch gets low and places the stroke behind square for four. Really good timing
Taylor to Warner, 1 run shortish on middle, pulled to square leg for a run
Taylor to Finch, no run too straight, worked to square leg
Taylor to Finch, no run a half-volley on middle is punched to mid-on who fumbles but no run
Taylor to Finch, no run better from Taylor. Using the cutter on off, 125 kph. Defended
Taylor to Finch, 1 leg bye good length on middle, off the pad to square leg. A direct hit but Warner has strolled in
Taylor to Warner, 2 runs shortish on off, Warner manufactures a stroke by jumping out of the way and opening the face to dab to third man. He hustles back for the second, fantastic stuff
Benn to Finch, no run ooh, lots of turn. Slightly short and wide outside off, the ball waits and rips past the outside edge
Benn to Finch, FOUR runs excellent shot. Overpitched outside off, Finch opens up his stance and pummels the drive over cover with such ease.
Benn to Finch, no run shortens the length on off, turns away. Finch taps to point
Benn to Finch, no run fuller this time and wide outside off, the ball beats the bat
Benn to Finch, no run ooh, Finch beaten on the inside edge and a big appeal ensues as bat hits pad. Too leg side-ish for consideration
Benn to Finch, no run blocked off the front foot
Holder to Warner, 3 runs fullish and wide, cracked through the point region for three more. Just keeps finding gaps, somehow.
Holder to Finch, no run back of a length, swerving back towards middle and leg. Finch misses his tuck. Hits him high on the pad
Holder to Finch, no run good length and straight, blocked

Holder to Finch, OUT plumb in front! Full and straight, Finch shuffles across, trying to flick over midwicket but just plain misses a straight one. The umpire's finger was up quicker than I could say out. Easy decision, Finch doesn't bother reviewing.
Holder to Khawaja, no run fullish outside off, squirted to point

Holder to Khawaja, FOUR runs around the wicket, Holder digs one in with short fine leg in place. Khawaja gets outside the line and just helps it on its way with a nice pull. Past that fielder for four, easy.
Narine to Warner, 1 run shortish and wide outside off, slapped to long-off
Narine to Khawaja, no run too full on off, blocked
Narine to Khawaja, no run ooh, huge turn. Khawaja plays back, the ball goes easily past the outside edge
Narine to Khawaja, no run slowish on off, short enough for Khawaja to go back and play to point
Narine to Khawaja, no run flatter outside off, the knuckle ball, comes back in to off. Khawaja chops a cut to point
Narine to Khawaja, no run started that wider outside leg. Hence, Khawaja went back and kept it out easily
Holder to Warner, 1 run slogged to midwicket. Wanted to go straight but the ball skewed off the inside half to midwicket, Pollard lets the ball go through with a naughty misfield
Holder to Khawaja, no run overpitched on off, driven into the off side
Holder to Khawaja, FOUR runs nice stroke. Too full and Khawaja leans on the drive and easily threads the gap at cover. Decent timing too
Holder to Khawaja, no run fullish length outside off, blocked into the off side
Holder to Khawaja, no run a smooth drive to cover to end the over
Narine to Warner, 1 run tossed up on off, punched to deep cover
Narine to Khawaja, no run some flight on middle and off, Khawaja stays back to defend
Narine to Khawaja, no run beaten on the outside edge. Lots and lots of turn from leg/middle to outside off. Nicely bowled
Narine to Khawaja, 1 run strays down leg, swept away towards short fine leg who gets a hand on the diving stop
Narine to Warner, 1 run tossed up on middle and leg, inside edged towards fine leg for another run
Narine to Khawaja, no run the knuckle ball to finish. Full on off, blocked confiedently
Holder to Warner, 1 run shot! Shortish on middle, Warner swivel-pulls to deep square leg
Holder to Khawaja, no run good length on off, cramping Khawaja for any room. Flicked to midwicket. Good lines
Holder to Khawaja, no run rather full on off, stylishly driven to mid-off
Holder to Khawaja, FOUR runs strays on middle and leg. Khawaja gets a fine tickle on that and sends the ball to the fine leg boundary. Easily done
Holder to Khawaja, FOUR runs another one. Four more. Too straight from holder, over-compensates and Khawaja nurdles to the fine leg boundary again
Holder to Khawaja, no run better comeback. Good length outside off and Khawaja blocks
Narine to Warner, 1 run tossed up on off, drilled to long-off
Narine to Khawaja, 1 run too straight, leg side-ish. Khawaja sweeps to deep backward square leg
Narine to Warner, 1 run slapped. On the bounce to long-off. Narine, from around the wicket, floats one up outside off
Narine to Khawaja, no run the knuckle ball on off, Khawaja reads it and defends
Narine to Khawaja, 1 run tossed up on off and Khawaja presents the full face of the bat to drive to long-off
Narine to Warner, no run overpitched on middle and leg, defended
Brathwaite to Khawaja, no run tight line outside off, skewed to midwicket
Brathwaite to Khawaja, 1 run too short on middle. Pulled to deep square leg
Brathwaite to Warner, no run a good length on off, chopped to point
Brathwaite to Warner, 2 runs fullish on off, steered past point and Warner gets back for the second with ease

Brathwaite to Warner, no run Khawaja sold his partner there. Back of a length on leg, the ball hits Warner's thigh pad and ricochets into Brathwaite's follow-through. Khawaja sets off and then says no. Warner makes it back though
Narine to Khawaja, no run some flight outside off, Khawaja goes back to push to cover
Narine to Khawaja, 2 runs full and wide, crisply driven to deep cover for a couple
Narine to Khawaja, no run beauty. Tossed up outside off, Khawaja strides forward but is beaten
Narine to Khawaja, no run shorter and wider, chopped into Ramdin's body
Narine to Khawaja, no run slower and wide, some flight, some turn. Left
Narine to Khawaja, no run and again, beaten on the outside edge by some turn
Brathwaite to Warner, 1 run back of a length and angled in on middle from round the wicket, Warner backs away slightly and punches a single to mid-off
Brathwaite to Khawaja, FOUR runs shot! Languid. A tad overpitched on middle, Khawaja flows forward and drives it ram-rod straight down the ground
Brathwaite to Khawaja, 1 run veering into the pads, clipped to fine leg
Brathwaite to Warner, 1 run short on middle from over the wicket, patted to cover for one
Brathwaite to Khawaja, no run full and angled in from round the wicket to Khawaja. Stops a bit on him. Dropped gently into the pitch
Brathwaite to Khawaja, no run looks like a cutter outside off, 109ks, check-pushed to cover
Benn to Warner, no run tossed and full on middle, crisply driven to cover
Benn to Warner, no run chopped from middle stump to point. Warner backed away outside leg and played it
Benn to Warner, 1 run Warner steps out and gets deceived in flight. He drags an inside edge to the midwicket region
Benn to Khawaja, no run Benn drifts this into middle, Khawaja sits back and pokes an inside edge to leg
Benn to Khawaja, no run sliding down leg, tickled to short fine leg
Brathwaite to Warner, no run full and angled in on middle from round the wicket, Warner defends it to short midwicket
Brathwaite to Warner, 1 run back of a length on middle, Warner goes a shade outside leg, drops it to mid-off, and sets off
Brathwaite to Smith, no run back of a length on middle, Smith shuffles across and works to square leg
Brathwaite to Smith, no run slower ball, cuts in just a shade outside off, check-pushed back to the bowler
Brathwaite to Smith, no run back of a length and quicker outside off, Smith gets on top of the bounce and solidly punches to short extra cover
Brathwaite to Smith, 1 run pitched up on off, Smith drives a single to mid-on. They take on Benn's arm
Benn to Smith, no run drifts on off and turns away, dabbed with soft hands to short third man
Benn to Smith, FOUR runs Smith surges down the track, meets the pitch of this full ball, and belts it back over the bowler's head
Benn to Smith, no run loopier and dips on off, Smith walks forward and taps it back to Benn
Benn to Smith, 1 run shorter and outside off, chopped to point for one
Benn to Warner, no run flighted and straight, worked to short midwicket
Benn to Warner, no run slider on off, cramps the left-hander for room. He looks to cut a not o short ball and nearly chops it back on
Narine to Smith, no run floater outside off, dabbed to cover on the front foot

Narine to Smith, OUT Narine returns and strikes! Umpire Llong's finger goes up. Was that doing too much? Looked so. Biting offbreak, tossed full, from Narine, Smith is deceived and is rapped on the front pad in line with the stumps. Perhaps, curling down l
Narine to Maxwell, no run off-stump ball, dabbed to cover

Narine to Maxwell, OUT Narine takes down Maxi for a duck! Big offbreak, rips in from outside off, shoots through the gate and nails the off stump. Maxi aimed a cover drive and missed. Two wickets in three balls for Narine. He still has the fizz
Narine to Marsh, no run another offbreak, defensive prod from Marsh
Narine to Marsh, no run another offbreak, inside-edged onto the pad
Benn to Warner, 1 run tucked off the hips to midwicket
Benn to Marsh, no run tossed on off and turns away, poked out to point off the outer half
Benn to Marsh, 1 run pushed through the cover-point region for one
Benn to Warner, no run slid in on off, Warner does not have enough room to cut. He chops to cover
Benn to Warner, no run turns in short on middle, played back to Benn
Benn to Warner, no run heading down leg, deflected to short fine leg

Narine to Marsh, no run floated and turns in, hits the pad outside off? Inside edge? Umpire Llong turns down the appeal. Narine wants to challenge the decision. It would have hit the leg stump. It is a legal ball. No inside snick involved. Kisses the pad a
Narine to Marsh, no run follows the offbreak with an off-stump knuckle ball, squirted out
Narine to Marsh, no run tosses this offbreak, blocked back to Narine
Narine to Marsh, 1 run swept from outside off to deep backward square leg. First run from Narine after nine balls
Narine to Warner, 1 run leading edge as Warner plays the flick early, loops wide of cover
Benn to Warner, 1 run drifting down leg, helped around the corner
Benn to Marsh, no run jabbed to short extra cover
Benn to Marsh, 2 runs pushed past cover
Benn to Marsh, 1 run tossed on middle, scooped behind square, wide of Ramdin
Benn to Warner, no run straighter one, blocked back to Benn
Benn to Warner, 1 run chopped from the stumps to point for one
Narine to Warner, SIX runs slower through the air on off, Warner takes on Narine and launches him straight down the ground
Narine to Warner, 1 run short and wide outside off, slapped out to deep cover as Warner reaches his half-century
Narine to Marsh, no run offbreak, squeezed to mid-on off an inside edge
Narine to Marsh, no run lobbed up on off, defended to short extra cover
Narine to Marsh, 1 run fuller on middle, eased down to long-on for one
Narine to Warner, no run big turn away from Warner. He pulls his bat inside the line and leaves it be
Benn to Marsh, no run full on off, Marsh flashes a drive to extra cover
Benn to Marsh, 3 runs Marsh stretches forward and meets a full toss. Paddled to fine leg for three. Positive running
Benn to Warner, no run turns just outside off, jabbed to the off side

Benn to Warner, 1 run Warner hangs back and chops a single to short third man. He sets off for a single. Marsh, however, isn't as quick as Warner. But he slides his bat in and makes it. A direct hit could have put him in trouble
Benn to Marsh, no run hint of turn away from the right hander, dabbed to backward point
Benn to Marsh, no run slides on middle, a touch short, the batsman keeps back and defends it back to Benn
Fletcher to Warner, no run half-tracker outside off, swatted on the back foot to midwicket
Fletcher to Warner, 2 runs another half-tracker outside off, forces a cut past the covers off the back foot
Fletcher to Warner, no run keeps it short and outside off, Warner reaches out and chops to short third man
Fletcher to Warner, 2 runs Warner skips back and punches this short ball from outside off past the covers. Australia seal a bonus-point win
That is all we have for you. Thanks for tuning in. Goodbye and cheers!
Australia won by 6 wickets (with 146 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Nathan Lyon, AUS
